price: Katakanlah, "Tidak ada seorang pun di langit dan di bumi yang mengetahui perkara yang gaib, kecuali Allah" dan mereka tidak mengetahui bila mereka akan dibangkitkan.
arabic: قُل لَّا يَعۡلَمُ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلۡغَيۡبَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُۚ وَمَا يَشۡعُرُونَ أَيَّانَ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul lā yaʿlamu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi al-ghayba illā al-lahu wamā yashʿurūna ayyāna yub'ʿathūna
